item.title: Passing images to LLMs in C# with Microsoft.Extensions.AI
item.description: I recently posted about how to get started calling LLMs with C# using the Microsoft.Extensions.AI NuGet package. The model we chose to use was gpt-4o-mini, which has the advantage of being "multimodal", as it can accept not only text input, but images as well. In this post I'll show how you can pass an image to this model using Microsoft.Extensions.AI and ask it to describe the image. It's relatively straightforward, but as always seems to be the case with these things, there was a gotcha I ran into.

item.title: Calling Azure OpenAI models from C# with Microsoft.Extensions.AI
item.description: AI opens up a lot of exciting possibilities for developers to use its capabilities within their own applications, but it can feel a bit overwhelming getting started.
